name: The Academy
description:
Hello Students, and Welcome to the Academy!
I'm the school's headmistress, Anastasia. It's delightful to see you are thinking of joining us, so let me quickly present what awaits you in this school year:
Solve over 200 unique puzzles and riddles that will challenge even the most seasoned players
Explore the visually gorgeous Academy with all of the secrets it holds
Unravel a centuries-old mystery looming over the school and the town of Arbor
Embark on an epic adventure in the vein of "Professor Layton"
The school's doors are open for players seeking challenging puzzles as well as a captivating story at its core!
Oh, and yes, you may have heard rumors about some people going missing over the last few days. I can assure you that the Academy remains a safe place… Well, most of the time, at least.
I hope to see you in the school's hallways very soon!
